cells.data:
-- inits :: [a] -> [[a]]
-- inits :: String -> [String]
on inits(xs)
	script elemInit
		on |位|(_, i, xs)
			items 1 thru i of xs
		end |位|
	end script
	
	script charInit
		on |位|(_, i, xs)
			text 1 thru i of xs
		end |位|
	end script
	
	if class of xs is string then
		{""} & map(charInit, xs)
	else
		{{}} & map(elemInit, xs)
	end if
end inits
